lead_paragraph: The former Penn State football player Chris Bell has pleaded guilty to a misdemeanor charge of making terroristic threats. The case dated to April, when the police said that Bell stormed into a campus dining hall and threatened his teammate Devon Still with an eight-inch knife. The police said that three assistant football coaches disarmed Bell, who was later kicked off the team.
